full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 645 Filed 03/11/22 Page 9 of 50 M38TMAX1 9
1 I don't know if anything was actually filed or anything done.
2 There were no charges brought.
3 Q. You said a family member, no longer a family member.
4 Again, without listing names, what was the nature of the familial relationship?
5 A. A stepbrother.
6 Q. You said stepbrother?
7 A. Yes.
8 Q. I'm going to ask you to look at question 48B. Question 48B reads: If your answer to 48 was yes, do you believe this would affect your ability to serve fairly and impartially as a juror in this case?
9 When you filled this out on November 4, you left that blank. What is an accurate answer to 48B?
10 A. It would have been no, because it did not affect my ability to be fair and impartial at all.
11 Q. I'm going to ask you to turn to page 13 of the questionnaire. Question 25 reads: Have you or any of your relatives or close friends ever been a victim of a crime?
12 And you checked no when you filled this out on November 4. Is no an accurate answer?
13 A. Looking back at it now, no, it's an incorrect answer.
14 Q. Who would have an accurate answer have been?
15 A. It would have been yes.
16 Q. Yes self, yes friend or family?
17 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00010224
